sentences.en: ...a programme to inoculate every child in the country.
sentences.cn: ...一个给全国每个孩子接种疫苗的计划。

sentences.en: A corps of doctors arrived to inoculate the recruits.
sentences.cn: 一队医生来给新兵打防疫针.

sentences.en: After the 1960 s, China began to inoculate BCG, pertussis, diphtheria, tetanus, measles and poliomyelitis vaccines.
sentences.cn: 六十年代后, 中国开始在大、中城市接种卡介苗 、 百日咳 、 白喉 、 破伤风 、 麻疹、脊髓灰质炎的疫苗的工作.

sentences.en: An invisible god can inoculate you against those failures.
sentences.cn: 看不见的神可以帮你预防这些失误.

sentences.en: Good fiscal management did not inoculate Spain against mass unemployment.
sentences.cn: 良好的财政管理并未使西班牙免遭大规模失业的命运.

sentences.en: I was just meant to come out here and inoculate some wee babies.
sentences.cn: 我是过来这边给小孩子们接种疫苗的.

sentences.en: Inoculate lactic acid funguses ferment in the mixture of banana and milk.
sentences.cn: 将香蕉泥与牛奶调配接种乳酸菌发酵制成凝固型香蕉酸牛乳.

sentences.en: Objective In order to inoculate situation of child re n's Hepatitis B vaccine, evaluation immunity effect.
sentences.cn: [目的]解儿童乙肝疫苗接种情况, 评价免疫效果.

sentences.en: Objective In order to inoculate situation of child ren's Hepatitis B vaccine, evaluation immunity effect.
sentences.cn: 解儿童乙肝疫苗接种情况, 评价免疫效果.

sentences.en: That would inoculate the new owners from ridicule a cathartic demolition for the Country Club set.
sentences.cn: 这样,新主人就可以免遭奚落,乡村俱乐部也可以省心.

sentences.en: The cultivate bacteria are mainly inoculate ones when sinusitis induced shorter than 2 weeks.
sentences.cn: 术后2周内,培养的细菌以种植菌为主.

sentences.en: The main cause of measles was failure to inoculate measles vaccine for children.
sentences.cn: 未接种麻疹疫苗是造成发病的主要原因.

sentences.en: Using aseptic technique, inoculate all plates.
sentences.cn: 使用无菌技术, 接种所有的培养平板.

sentences.en: With more vaccine available, this means the H 1 N 1 vaccine can inoculate twice as.
sentences.cn: 随着疫苗越来越多, 这就意味着H1N1流感疫苗可以每人注射两次.

words.tran_cn: [机] 变质剂；接种体，接种菌

trans.tran_en: to protect someone against a disease by putting a weak form of the disease into their body using a needle
